public class CGLIBDynamicProxyWeaving
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor, java.io.Serializable

CGLIB Dynamic Proxy Weaving mode Weaving implemention is dynamic proxy Every target service object has its DynamicProxyWeaving object
